dialogue.text: Anyone seen a tall demon dude? Kinda grumpy, runs a music thingy?
¿Qué buscan aquí, niñas? This is an official E.Y.E.S. facility, not a concert hall.
Whoa! Babe, check it out! A duck! With a little hat! And is that a knife?!
A duck...? With a knife? Maybe we shouldn't bother him, he sounds... official.
¡Pato! ¡Soy el Jefe Pato Guerrero! ¡Y esto no es un cuchillo cualquiera, es oficial!
You are trespassing! State your business immediately or face removal. A la fuerza if necessary.
Removal...? PJ, he sounds serious. Let's just tell him we're looking for your dad.
Nah, where's the fun in that? Escort sounds boring. How 'bout a rap battle instead, Chief Pato?
A rap battle? Here? Are you sure that's appropriate? He is the Chief Officer...
¿Un... rap battle? ¡Qué ridiculez! Do I look like I have time for childish games?
Although... such spontaneous vocal challenges could reveal emotional tells... An unorthodox interrogation method perhaps. Hmph.
¡Muy bien, mocosas! Let's see if your rhymes are sharper than my blade. ¡Prepárense!
Ay ay ay, El Pato! Vamonos!
*Sigh*... Just... try not to get us arrested, okay babe?
